# llms-full.txt - Complete AI-friendly profile of Arif Miah
# Last updated: 2025-06-20

## Personal Info
Name: Arif Miah (aka Arfomian)
Title: Full Stack Developer | MERN Expert | Aspiring AI+Tech Leader
Location: Chittagong, Bangladesh
Portfolio: https://arif-miah-portfolio.vercel.app

## Summary
I’m a MERN stack full stack developer with strong TypeScript, UI/UX, and backend expertise. With a background in science and creative storytelling, I focus on building performant, scalable, and accessible web applications. I aspire to lead ethically in a world shared by AI, humans, and beyond.

## Skills
Frontend: React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, Redux Toolkit, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Shadcn UI, Material UI  
Backend: Node.js, Express.js, REST API, Socket.io, JWT, Firebase, Stripe  
Database: MongoDB, Mongoose  
DevOps & Tools: Git, GitHub, Postman, Vercel, Netlify, Zod, ESLint, Linux  
Others: C/C++, Python (basic), Figma, GIMP, Inkscape

## Key Projects
1. **Medi‑Sphere** – Medicine management app (React, Redux, Node, MongoDB)
2. **Cycle‑Sphere** – E-commerce for bikes with Stripe checkout and product filters
3. **Vibe Chat** – Real-time chat app (Socket.io + React)
4. **Clyst** – Personal journaling meets social sharing, built in Next.js
5. **Color Contrast Checker** – Tool for testing text contrast across UI layers

## Education
- B.Sc. in Computer Science & Engineering (Premier University) – In progress  
- Programming Hero – Level 1 & Level 2 Web Development bootcamps

## Certifications
- Frontend & Full Stack Web Development – Programming Hero  
- Responsive Web Design – FreeCodeCamp

## Leadership Vision
I aim to lead with empathy, ethics, and innovation in tech. I view AI as a co-pilot, not a competitor. My mission is to build not just apps — but impact.
